description:
When QT falls in love with a hot little coffeemaker, he gets caught up in a revolution that pits abandoned appliances against their human oppressors!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even Vacuum Cleaners Fall in Love, Baby
Même les aspirateurs tombent amoureux, baby
Soujiki Datte Koi Suru Jan yo
掃除機だって恋するじゃんよ
